segments.text: hi . I ’ m feeling very nervous . I just had a test and I ’ m not sure how well or how badly I did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it ’ s not use worrying about it now . you ’ Ve done test and you can ’ t change any of your answers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that ’ s true . I really should go home and prepare for the next test , but I ’ m feeling tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: let ’ s go and get a coffee together . That will help you to wake up again !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok . I feel like sitting down and having a chat . How have you been recently ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , you know me . I ’ m always happy ! If I think I ’ m getting into a bad mood , I call some friends and socialize or have a chat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that ’ s a good idea . I usually just sit at home alone and get increasingly moody .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hate spending too much time at home . I get bored of it really quickly . I ’ m always excited about going out to party or other social event and meeting people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: perhaps I ’ m being too shy . I should go out more too and not spend time worrying about tests !
segments.speaker: S2
